page.title: 05A WORSBROUGH LANDMARK
page.content: {Black Rock}has been part of Worsbrough for hundreds of years, or so it is said. It is a landmark in the Ward Green/Worsbrough Common area, a huge black rock with a flat top. There are many tales about it. Some think it was blown there. Some believe it was a hospital as there are arches in it. It is a place where young people in the area go. They do everything there. They paint slogans and pictures on it. On top there is a skull and crossbones. At one side they have made a scene of a waterfall. They fight over it and one group takes possession of it. Ward Greeners fight the Worsbrough Commoners and kids from Worsbrough Bridge help the Ward Greeners, but, after the fight, everyone goes there just the same, no matter who wins.
